name: petrographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the scientific description of the different types of rock: The rock samples were treated to a thorough petrographic examination. From the available petrographic evidence, it is not possible to determine the exact origin of the sample. This theory has been confirmed by petrographical observation.
More examplesFewer examplesPetrographic observations suggest that these rocks are metamorphosed volcanic rocks.We had to revise our earlier work in the light of new petrographic data.They were able to calculate the porosity of the surface by petrographic methods.
